snippet: Softer yarns and new knitting techniques have made wearing hosiery a more pleasurable experience, companies say.
abstract: Hosiery is finding a new generation of female fans who do not view stockings as necessary evil mandated by office dress codes and social mores, but as bona fide style choice with long-forgotten cosmetic powers to shape and slim legs.
lead_paragraph: Softer yarns and new knitting techniques have made wearing hosiery a more pleasurable experience, companies say.

headline.main: For Pantyhose, It’s Back to Work
headline.print_headline: For Pantyhose, It’s Back to Work
